titleStmt.title: Purchas, his paradise A sermon preached at Lismore in Ireland, upon Sunday the 18. of December, 1634. Preached, and now presented as [sic] the Lord Dungarvans welcome into Ireland. By Ambrose Purchas priest.
titleStmt.author: Purchas, Ambrose.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Raworth, and are to be sould at his house in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
